docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: 线程管理
docs.text: 定义、创建和控制线程函数。 More...

docs.title: 函数
docs.text: 函数原型 描述 osThreadId_t osThreadNew (osThreadFunc_t func, void argument, const osThreadAttr_t attr) Create a thread and add it to Active Threads. const char * osThreadGetName (osThreadId_t thread_id) Get name of a thread. osThreadId_t  osThreadGetId (void) Return the thread ID of the current running thread.

docs.title: osThreadNew
参数说明
docs.text:
• func 线程回调函数
  • argument 作为开始参数传递给线程函数的指针
  • attr 线程创建参数 默认:NULL
